cases.weDoWell: We do a great job because we care about quality, aesthetics and, most of all, results.
cases.weHelped: We helped this American start-up to define its business and released its product.
cases.webApp: A Webapp that facilitates getting student loans for young people all over Brazil.
cases.providers: Service providers succeed in life with this app we created for a Brazilian start-up.

footer.weEmbrace: We embrace the talents from the world.

header.weCreate: We create digital products and online experiences that people love

headerOurCareer.hereTheTrainee: Here the trainee doesn't make coffee, it makes a difference. ● Every 4 months we hire undergraduate students to start their careers with us.
headerOurCareer.makeYourCandidacy: Apply now and get an answer first. Don't worry, you can update your details later.
headerOurCareer.waitForTheResult: Wait for the result. We will forward it to you by email.
headerOurCareer.youAreGoingTo: You will work in an exceptional IT team and will be trained for 12 months. The focus is to expand your knowledge in different technologies, so you discover what you really like and we direct your potential to generate maximum impact. ● We are flexible with schedules, which makes it easier for you to reconcile your academic routine.
headerOurCareer.desirable: + Desirable to be studying the last year of Computer Science or equivalent or another higher course in the IT area;
headerOurCareer.availability: + Availability to work 30 hours per week;
headerOurCareer.knowledge: + Knowledge of programming logic and data structure.

TalentsOurCareer.weEmbrace: We embrace the talents of the world
TalentsOurCareer.weAreConnected: We are connected by technology and passion to make a positive impact on the world. If you're hungry to grow, then we'd love to have you on the team.
TalentsOurCareer.weLove: We love our work Except on Saturdays
TalentsOurCareer.weCreate: We create a welcoming and inclusive environment for you to give your best. ● But for a good job, you also need a good rest. That's why weekends are for resting and enjoying life!
TalentsOurCareer.enjoyToo: Also enjoy a day off on your birthday. After all, this is a special day!
TalentsOurCareer.empathize: Having empathy is a great work practice. We are all constantly learning and looking to grow together.
TalentsOurCareer.comment1: “Relaxed atmosphere, flexible hours, very nice team, opportunity for growth.”
TalentsOurCareer.comment2: “At L2 you learn something new every day. Here, your opinion matters and contributes to the growth of the team.”
TalentsOurCareer.comment3: “L2 has a great work environment, is flexible and very supportive.”
TalentsOurCareer.comment4: “L2 has created an amazing environment where everyone helps each other and has fun working together.”
TalentsOurCareer.comment5: “Welcoming staff, I enjoy working here, it has been a great opportunity for knowledge and experience”
TalentsOurCareer.comment6: “I grew up a lot in L2, personally and professionally. We are always learning something new and helping each other.”

customers.weAreProud: We are proud to partner with companies and start-ups that are hungry for innovation.

services.weImprove: We improve the experience of the products and services of our customers, focusing on results for their businesses.
services.increase: Increase your productive capacity ● Having our team with you, you add to your team professionals in love with work who have a diversity of skills.
services.uxuiTeam: Our UX/UI and development team will help you to project and build your MVP from the scratch, “ensuring” a fast and profitable delivery.
services.coCreation: Co-creation with our multidisciplinary team in the design of your product and business strategies.
services.weDesign: We design a gorgeous and functional products for the users, allied with the goals of your business.
services.ourTechLead: Our Teach Lead Maicon Martins will advise you about the best practices that your company can use in your infrastructure.
